4 template<class T>
5 MsgOrientationFeedForward<T>::MsgOrientationFeedForward(ros::NodeHandle &nh,std::string topic):RosOrientationFeedForwardBase(nh)
6 {
7  this->ori_sub_=this->nh_.subscribe(topic,10,&MsgOrientationFeedForward::callbackOrientation,this);

11 template<class T>
12 void MsgOrientationFeedForward<T>::callbackOrientation(T msg)
13 {
14  this->current_orientation_ =msg;
15 }
16 template<class T>
17 void MsgOrientationFeedForward<T>::update(const ros::TimerEvent&)
18 {
19  if(this->enable_)
20  {
21  Eigen::Quaterniond quat;
22  convertMsg(quat,this->current_orientation_);
23  this->updateOrientation(quat);
24  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
25  pose.header.frame_id=tf::resolve(this->tf_prefix_,this->ee_frame_id_);
26  Pose forward=this->getPose();
27  convertMsg(pose,forward);
28  this->pose_pub_.publish(pose);
29 
30  }
31 
32 }
33 template<class T>
34 bool MsgOrientationFeedForward<T>::init()
35 {
36  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
37  RosOrientationFeedForwardBase::init();
38  T init=*ros::topic::waitForMessage<T>(this->topic_,this->nh_);
39  Orientation ori;
40  convertMsg(ori,init);
41  this->setInitial(ori);
42 
43 }
